Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Services

Localization of user and Downloading-storing-uploading data

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DatabaseHandler
    Handles all operations for storing locally a subset of the remote MySQL of IMC to local SQLite
    Download_Data
    This class performs the data downloading from the remote server
    InternetConnCheck
    Instant check for internet access
    Security
    Authenticate the user using a username and password.
    Service_Data
    It is a controller to decide when to update local database.
    Service_Location
    Find current location and broadcast if location has changed
    Upload_Data
    Major methods to upload data to remote server are gathered in this class.
